medieval_village.name: Medieval Village
medieval_village.description: Charming medieval village with cobblestone streets and thatched-roof houses
medieval_village.prompt: A charming medieval village with cobblestone streets, thatched-roof houses, and vibrant flower gardens under a bright blue sky

futuristic_city.name: Futuristic City
futuristic_city.description: Sci-fi city with neon lights, flying cars, and skyscrapers
futuristic_city.prompt: Futuristic city with neon lights, flying cars, towering skyscrapers, and holographic advertisements in a cyberpunk setting

mystical_forest.name: Mystical Forest
mystical_forest.description: Magical forest with glowing mushrooms and ancient trees
mystical_forest.prompt: Mystical forest with glowing mushrooms, ancient trees, magical particles, and ethereal lighting filtering through the canopy

desert_oasis.name: Desert Oasis
desert_oasis.description: Peaceful oasis in vast desert with palm trees and ancient ruins
desert_oasis.prompt: Desert oasis with palm trees, crystal clear water, ancient ruins, and golden sand dunes under a sunset sky

underwater_city.name: Underwater City
underwater_city.description: Submerged city with coral buildings and marine life
underwater_city.prompt: Underwater city with coral-covered buildings, bioluminescent plants, schools of fish, and ethereal blue lighting

mountain_fortress.name: Mountain Fortress
mountain_fortress.description: Fortress carved into mountain peaks with defensive walls
mountain_fortress.prompt: Mountain fortress carved into rocky peaks with stone walls, watchtowers, and dramatic mountain vistas

space_station.name: Space Station
space_station.description: Advanced space station with Earth view and docking bays
space_station.prompt: Advanced space station with sleek corridors, observation decks viewing Earth, docking bays, and holographic displays

haunted_mansion.name: Haunted Mansion
haunted_mansion.description: Gothic mansion with dark corridors and mysterious atmosphere
haunted_mansion.prompt: Gothic haunted mansion with dark wood paneling, flickering candles, ornate furniture, and eerie shadows

tropical_resort.name: Tropical Resort
tropical_resort.description: Luxury tropical resort with beaches and palm trees
tropical_resort.prompt: Luxury tropical resort with white sand beaches, crystal blue water, palm trees, and elegant beach villas

alien_landscape.name: Alien Landscape
alien_landscape.description: Otherworldly alien planet with strange rock formations
alien_landscape.prompt: Alien landscape with bizarre rock formations, alien vegetation, multiple moons in the sky, and otherworldly atmosphere
